verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> to you <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to cause the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

<S%H2351>Without<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6186>order<s%> it from the <S%H6153>evening<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He shall <S%H6186>order<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> thereof: <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals shall be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake.<s%>

And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4634>rows,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> on a <S%H4635>row,<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on each <S%H4635>row,<s%> that it may be on the <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H234>memorial,<s%> even an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> he shall set it in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> being taken from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And it shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons';<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to him of the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> whose <S%H1121>father<s%> <S%H376><s%> was an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and this <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> woman and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3481>Israel<s%> <S%H5327>strove<s%> together in the <S%H4264>camp;<s%>

And the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5344>blasphemed<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the Lord, and <S%H7043>cursed.<s%> And they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> (and his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan:<s%>)
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward,<s%> that the <S%H6310>mind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> might be <S%H6567>showed<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3318>Bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that has <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> him.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And he that <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall certainly <S%H7275>stone<s%> him: as well the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as he that is <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H249>land,<s%> when he <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H5315>beast<s%> <S%H929><s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good;<s%> <S%H5315>beast<s%> for <S%H5315>beast.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5997>neighbor;<s%> as he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him;

<S%H7667>Breach<s%> for <S%H7667>breach,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth:<s%> as he has <S%H5414>caused<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in a <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be <S%H5414>done<s%> to him again.
And he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H929>beast,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> it: and he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H120>man,<s%> he shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H4941>law,<s%> as well for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as for one of your <S%H249>own<s%> <S%H249>country:<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%> And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
